My Work

Check out some of my projects:

Filmify, media search & selection app

Technologies Used: JavaScript, Node.js live-server, React, Materialize CSS, MongoDB, Mongoose

Designed and executed the build of a uniquely tailored search application that integrated database and IMDb api queries in a truncated MVP timeline. Utilized a responsive CSS framework to style dynamically rendering React components.

Abibas, an ecommerce app focusing on sportswear

Technologies Used: JavaScript, Node.js, Express, Webpack, Cassandra, PostgreSQL, New Relic, EBS

Optimized the generation and seeding of 10 million unique primary records in under 10 minutes in both PostgreSQL and Cassandra by using streams and writing to CSV files. Inherited existing codebase and re-worked the backend in order to accommodate more user traffic. Reduced postgreSQL query time from approximately 1200 ms to approximately 0.15 ms. Deployed and tested individual service and proxy server via EBS, New Relic and Artillery.

BetaCritic, single page movie review application

Technologies Used: JavaScript, React, MongoDB, Express, Node.js, Webpack, Jest, Enzyme, AWS EBS

Created a dynamically-rendering application that includes the official movie details and images. Implemented robust test suite with Jest/Enzyme resulting in consistent application performance. Collaborated with teammates during the process of building a proxy server to host multiple components. Deployed proxy server via AWS Elastic Beanstalk and MongoDB Atlas.

Sizzle Reel, video edit

Technologies Used: Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Media Encoder

Short compilation of a few of my video editing jobs working with a variety of brands and agencies. Not included, but I also have expereince with/enjoy working on narrative and documentary projects.
